alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 4:48AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A mix of snow showers, rain showers, and patchy fog expected for the morning commute... An area of scattered to numerous rain and snow showers and patchy fog will be moving east during the morning hours. This mixture of weather will be pushing across portions of I-80 and various state routes including 225, 227, 278, and 306. Snow levels are varying this morning from 5000 to 6000 feet with wind gusts of 25 mph. Motorists traveling along roadways should expect rapid changes to weather, visibility, and traction during their morning commute. The weather will continue through 800 am this morning. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
